title: 7 Things That Will Make You A Happier Cyclist!

media:group.media:title: 7 Things That Will Make You A Happier Cyclist!
media:group.media:description:
Here at GCN we love cycling, but there are days where we are just a bit grumpy out on the bike. But it doesn't have to be this way! Conor and Manon show you 7 things which make them happier cyclists.

Chapters:
0:00 - Intro
0:46 - Cafe Stops
1:33 - New Kit
1:58 - Riding Somewhere New
2:56 - Smooth Roads
3:40 - Good Weather
4:26 - Tailwinds
5:11 - Getting Out For A Ride
